story.title: Unseen and Unheard - Episode 1
story.storyDescription: Why is Heather's boyfriend talking to her like she isn't there?
story.creator: web-uploader

author.bio: Charlie Poe is a former Virginia police officer who enjoys writing mysteries and horror. Follow him to read more stories like Unseen and Unheard.

story.authorPromoDescription: Charlie Poe is a former Virginia police officer who enjoys writing mysteries and horror. Follow him to read more stories like Unseen and Unheard.

messages.text: Hey, Heather. About last nightâ€¦
Iâ€™m sure you wouldnâ€™t want to hear anything from me right nowâ€¦
But I just need to say something.
Iâ€™m listening.
I wish I didnâ€™t say those things. I wish I could take it all back.
I wish I had more time to explain everythingâ€¦Iâ€™m sick. Iâ€™m numb.
And Iâ€¦I hope you can forgive me. Iâ€™m never going to forgive myself.
Jax, donâ€™t be so dramatic. You know I love you. We had a little fight.
Thatâ€™s normal.
I wish so badly I could hear from you.
I miss you so much. Itâ€™s hard to believe youâ€™re gone already.
What?
Itâ€™s only been a few hours, Jax. Iâ€™m not going anywhere.
I just needed to cool down a bit.
Heather, I wish we could have spent forever together.
Waitâ€¦
Are you dumping me?!
Heather calls Jax. The phone rings and ringsâ€¦
Answer the phone, Jax! Whatâ€™s going on?!
I wish it could have been me instead.
Jax, youâ€™re scaring me.
Heatherâ€¦
Why did you have to leave?
Jax, this isnâ€™t funny. Can you please pick up the phone?
I love you. I always have. I always will.
Jax, please pick up the phone. We can talk through thisâ€”
Iâ€™m not mad about last night, but youâ€™re scaring me.
Heather, Iâ€™m so sorry.
Jax, pleaseâ€¦stop ignoring me.
Jax?
Heather searches through some of the other contacts in her phone.
She frantically texts each one.
Mom?
Dad?
Please, someone, answer me!
Hey, itâ€™s Lauren. Iâ€¦heard about you and Jax.
Lauren? What are you talking about?
I guess I feel a little guilty andâ€¦
Could you ever forgive me?
Forgive you for what?!
Idk why Iâ€™m texting you. I guess I just feel like youâ€™re still here.
I am! What are you talking about?!
Donâ€™t worry. Iâ€™llâ€¦God, I hope youâ€™d be okay with thisâ€¦
Iâ€™ll take care of Jax.
What?
WTF is that supposed to mean?
Of course Iâ€™m not okay with you being with Jax!
If you try and make a move on him, I swear I will end you.
LAUREN? Do you hear me??
Hey Heathâ€¦itâ€™s Peter. Just wanted to say weâ€™re thinking about you. We love you.
Pete? Please tell me my texts are coming through.
School just wonâ€™t be the same.
For Kira, especially.
Kira? Whatâ€™s wrong with Kira?
Until we meet again. Au revoir.
Pete?
WTF is going on!?
Heather texts Kira.
Kira, please answer. Please please please.
Something weird is going on and itâ€™s really scaring me.
Kira, please, I need you.
I need my best friend. Iâ€™m really scared.
Who is this?
Why do you have this phone?
â€¦Kira?
I asked you a question. Who do you think you are?
Kira, what are you talking about?
Are my texts are coming through?
Yes, they are. Which is why I am pissed off.
Why do you have someone elseâ€™s property?
That phone belonged to someone important to me.
You have 5 seconds to tell me how you got this phone or I swear I am calling the cops.
Kira, itâ€™s me. Itâ€™s Heather.
Iâ€™m done playing with you. Iâ€™m calling the cops.
Wait!!
Kira, I donâ€™t know whatâ€™s going on, but Iâ€™m scaredâ€”
Itâ€™s me. Iâ€™ll prove it.
How?
I have a scar on my left arm.
So? Anyone could have seen that scar on Heatherâ€™s arm.
Yeah. But I got it when we were 10. Remember?
We were in the woods, and I tripped and fell on the rocks by the creek. I cut my arm really badly.
You decided that you wanted one too, so you drew one on with marker.
Stop. I donâ€™t know how you know that story.
Or how you got Heatherâ€™s phone â€” but Iâ€™m really freaked out now.
Kira, I swear on my life itâ€™s me.
This is really cruel. Why would you put me through this?
What are you talking about?
Fine. If youâ€™re really Heather, then whatâ€™s my favorite animal?
You tell everyone itâ€™s a flamingo. You have a flamingo necklace that youâ€™ve worn every day since you were two.
But I always say your favorite is the King Vulture, because it has pretty wings and a jacked-up face.
You like that thereâ€™s never a line to see it at the zoo.
Iâ€™m so confused right now. My head is spinning.
Me, too. Pleaseâ€¦Iâ€™m trying to understand whatâ€™s going on.
Can we just meet up at the pizzeria and try to work through this?
Okâ€¦but Iâ€™ve got 911 on speed dial.
Youâ€™re afraid Iâ€™m going to hurt you?
Umm, yeah. Youâ€™re a stranger who took my best friendâ€™s phone and knows an obscene amount about us and our livesâ€”
Thatâ€™s obviously pretty scary.
Kira, I would never hurt you. Look, just meet me at the pizzeria in 20 minutes, okay?
Wait, WTF. My car is gone!
God, a stolen car on top of everything?! Could this day get any worse?
You really donâ€™t know, do you?
Know what?
Heatherâ€™s car was totaled.
What? When?!
Last night.
Last night? After I left the party?
But wait, how would you know that and not me?
That doesnâ€™t make any sense.
Read this.
Read what?
Kira sends a link to Heather.
When she clicks on it, she reads the headline: Local Teen Killed in Wrong Way Crash.
Thereâ€™s a picture underneath it.
OMG. Thatâ€™s my car. Why is my car there?
Read it.
So she doesâ€¦
â€œLocal teen Heather Jankowski, age 16, was killed late last night when her vehicle was struck head on by a tractor-trailer going the wrong direction along I-87."
â€œPolice believe alcohol may have been a contributing factor.â€
Oh my Godâ€¦
Iâ€™m dead.
